item.title: PROJECT 10 : DATA ENGINEERING PROJECTS
item.description: Welcome to my Cliche… The advent of Big data no doubt has proliferated the need for Data Engineers. But what is Big data? They are data with 3 V’s and can’t be processed by traditional method. The 3 V’s are: Volume(large like Gigabytes,Pb..), Velocity (frequent, stream, real-time…) Variety ( different formats like csv, parquet, audio, video..) This kind of data needs specialized infrastructures, Schema, Storage, Processing tools, automation & monitoring.
